pli-tv-bu-vb-pc60:2.1.10: The six are linen, cotton, silk, wool, sunn hemp, and hemp; see [](pli-tv-kd8:3.1.6). | According to [](pli-tv-kd8:21.1.4) this is no smaller than 8 by 4 _sugataṅgula_, “standard fingerbreadths”.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc60:2.1.21: “A lot” renders _bahukaṃ_. [Sp.2.176](): _Bahukampi sibbatīti sacepi sabbaṃ sūcikammaṃ pariyosāpetvā cīvaraṃ niṭṭhāpeti, ekameva pācittiyaṃ_, “_Bahukampi sibbati_: even if he finishes the robe after completing all the needle work, there is just one offense entailing confession.”
